root.message: All metadata fields for the indicator 11-c-1, translated into en
root.data: Goal 11. Make cities and human settlements inclusive, safe, resilient and sustainable11.c Support least developed countries, including through financial and technical assistance, to build sustainable and resilient buildings using local materials11.c.1 Proportion of financial assistance allocated to least developed countries that is devoted to the construction of sustainable, resilient and resource-efficient buildings and the upgrading of old buildings, using local materialscategory IIICategory III
